Text:
No sound??  Using latest VLC  on this file.  

Cant work out why..sound works for my other MKV's
Sound works ignore my last post.

Really nice A/V quality, unfortunately ruined by
the encoder choosing to artificially stretch the
original image ratio to fill a 16.9 screen. Why 
some people prefer distorted/elongated images
over the correct A.R. just to lose the black bars 
baffles me.
